smṛtiḥ utpadyate
ātma manaḥ saṃyogāt saṃskāra apekṣā tad utpattiḥ iti ced na

saṃskāra saṃyogaḥ ca sakala ātma vyāpi tve pradeśa vṛtti abhyupagama doṣāt ca

original: duḥkhadarśanaheyādinā pañca prakāreṇa vijñānena yadanubhūtaṃ tatkatamena smaryate ?

tat idam prastūyate
dṛṣṭam dvi tri catur pañca prakāreṇa api cetasā

original: sarvāṇi khalu duḥkhadarśanādiheyāni pañcaprakārāṇi paramparānubhūtaṃ smaranti /

tat smaryate ca anyena
manaḥ vijñānena iti arthaḥ
tena khalu itaraiḥ api

original: atha dvādaśānāṃ cittānāṃ ko 'rthaḥ kenānubhūtaḥ katibhiḥ smaryate ?

dharmāḥ tu saṃjñā cetanā ādyā saṃprayuktāḥ
prāpti ādayaḥ viprayuktāḥ
saṃskṛtāḥ ca parama sūkṣmāḥ tasmāt ante dharma smṛti upasthānam
atas eva utpatti kramaḥ api tathā eva

original: prāyeṇa hi sattvāḥ rūpādyupabhogaratatvāt mokṣavimukhā bhavanti vedanābhinanditvāt,
analyzed: prāyeṇa hi sattvāḥ rūpa ādi upabhoga rata tvāt mokṣa vimukhāḥ bhavanti vedanā abhinandi tvāt
sā ca abhinandanā cittasya a dānta tvāt
tat ca a dānta tvam rāga ādibhiḥ
śraddhā ādibhiḥ ca dānta tvam bhavati
catuṣṭvam api catur viparyāsa pratipakṣa tvāt
aśucau śuci saṃjñā viparyāsa pratipakṣaḥ hi kāya parīkṣā
duḥkhe sukha saṃjñā viparyāsa pratipakṣaḥ vedanā parīkṣā
anitye nitya saṃjñā viparyāsa pratipakṣaḥ citta parīkṣā
cittasya laghu parivarti tvāt
anātmani ātma saṃjñā viparyāsa pratipakṣaḥ dharma parīkṣā
dharma smṛti upasthānasya vaicitryāt eka ātma saṃjñā viparyāsaḥ nivartate
ādi śabdāt catur āhāra pañca skandha pratipakṣa tvāt yathāyogam
sa tadānīm yoga ācāraḥ
samasta ālambinā antyena tān vetti adhruva tā ādibhiḥ
sambhinna ālambanam hi dharma smṛti upasthānam tri catur pañca skandha ālambana tvāt
pañca skandha ālambanam eva tu sāmānya ālambanam iti nirdiśyate

original: tena tu catvāryapi smṛtyupasthānānyabhisamasyānityato duḥkhataḥ śūnyato 'nātmataśceti caturbhirākāraiḥ pratyavekṣate /

original: tataḥ punaryogī kāyaṃ paramāṇusaṃghātakṣaṇasantānabhedena prabhidya paramāṇuśaḥ kṣaṇaśaśca nirīkṣate /

original: kalalādīnāṃ vā bījādyaśucyaṅgāni pṛthaṅmiśrībhūtāni ca yogī rūpāṇi nimitteṣu paśyati /
analyzed: kalala ādīnām vā bīja ādi aśuci aṅgāni pṛthak miśrībhūtāni ca yogī rūpāṇi nimitteṣu paśyati

original: tadūrdhvaṃ tasyānityatvādibhiḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇena yathāyogaṃ sarvadharmakajātīyatvādhimokṣe satyahaṃkāramamakāraviṣkambhanaprahāṇaṃ bhavati /

original: katamena punaratra smṛtyupasthānena kleśātyantakṣayo bhavati ? brūmaḥ /

yasmāt

satyeṣu tadā kaścid parīkṣate
